to clear up why people are freaking and saying virus: 
1.inside the .rar is a .exe file that you place in your me3 folder.( .exe is always scary to most)
2. after you double click the .exe you get a notice box that you cant read ( always scary for most)
3. it takes you to a website. ( always scary)

if you know what a registry editor does, you will not freak out. but again this program does exactly what its supposed to do.
the website is just the 3dm site where they post these things. it's a little harmless self-promotion, though i can see why some would be wary of it.
